text: [Music]
once upon a time a boy was born to a
king and queen who had long yearned for
a child this brought great joy to the
kingdom for they finally got an heir to
the throne the child was named
interrupts and a grand feast was thrown
for everyone the King invited the fairy
godmother to bless the occasion but the
minute she laid eyes on the newborn
Prince her joyous smile turned into a
frown is there anything that bothers you
his beautiful boy but it is a great pity
what the future holds for him what do
you mean it is written in his fate that
he will face grave danger either by a
servant a crocodile or a dog if I could
save him I would but that is beyond my
power the king was shocked and terribly
worried in great haste he built a
fortress upon a hill to protect his one
and only son he appointed guards to keep
watch around the clock interrupts grew
up within the enclosure of the fortress
there were teachers appointed for his
education and combat training the only
connection that he had with the outer
world was through the giant palace
windows that overlooked the kingdom
one day in a row saw a puppy playing
from the window and asked the guard to
bring it to him ah that puppy is so cute
go and get him for me the guard was
puzzled as he knew about the fate of
interrupts but he could not betray the
orders of the Prince so he went to the
King dog don't you know the prophecy
it's either a serpent a crocodile or a
dog that kills him as the King kept
scolding the guard in arose ran out to
the palace gates to play with the little
puppy he took the puppy and ran into the
courtroom please father I promise I'll
take good care of him please let me keep
him seeing him laughing and playing with
the puppy the king decided to let him
stay oh thank you Father
I shall name you fluffy and you and I
shall be pals forever
days passed followed by years an inner
us grew up to be a handsome young man
but he always yearned to explore the
outer world father why do you keep me
shut up in this palace you are not aware
of the dangers that lie in the outer
world I am aware of the prophecy but
look at fluffy and me we're inseparable
don't you think that at least a part of
the prophecy has been broken and if I
have to be a good king I need to be
aware of what is happening around the
world very well then I shall not stop
you go and explore the world but my son
be careful oh thank you Father I shall
be very careful the next day
fluffy and interest set sail on a ship
to a faraway Kingdom during their
journey they experienced a heavy
thunderstorm the mast of the ship broke
and the passengers aboard lost their
balance and some of them toppled into
the sea fluffy was nowhere to be seen
and this worried interrupts puppy where
are you where are you without a second
thought
Annerose jumped into the sea to save his
best friend Oh fluffy by a dear fluffy I
can't lose you in that moment of embrace
a neurosis noticed a crocodile that was
swimming towards done holding fluffy
tight he swam towards the ship in haste
suddenly the crocodile looks scared and
it at once dived back into the scene
interest was surprised and when he
turned around he saw a beautiful girl
standing with a bow and arrow on the
ship
climb aboard quickly thank you
did nobody tell you that you're not
supposed to swim in a thunderstorm
oh thank you you not only saved me but
also my best friend may I have the
privilege of knowing your name ah I'm
Elena
princess of the Kingdom of Alabama so
what brings a princess on board a ship
filled with commoners I wanted to
explore the world but my father wanted
me to marry an eligible prince so I
decided to go on a little adventure
before my fate gets sealed in arose was
very impressed by her bravery you tell
me what brings you here I I am in arose
I am a merchant just going to conduct
some business and so the two continued
to talk throughout the journey the ship
reached Alabama where Elena and interest
got down with fluffy at their heels the
king and his army were waiting by the
shore to take Elena back to the palace
on seeing a stranger with her
they arrested in Arras no let him go he
didn't do anything who are you stranger
and what business do you have with my
daughter seeing that he couldn't lie
anymore
interrupts had to reveal his true
identity he also expressed his desire to
marry Elena that is if they would
approve of it whoa forgive me dear
Prince guards remove his shackles
immediately and give him the best room
in our palace
you must be tired why don't you take a
nice warm bath and join us for dinner as
they ate and talked the King grew fond
of interrupts and called for the wedding
to be planned both the kings and queens
met for the marriage alliance a royal
wedding was planned for interest and
Elena but interest did not want to hide
the truth of his fate from his
wife-to-be
what happened interrupts why do you call
me here two hours before we exchange our
wedding vows is everything all right
are you not happy with the wedding there
is something I have to tell you I can't
hide this from you anymore what is it
dear
in arose told her about the prophecy
that the fairy godmother foretold he
also mentioned that as Elena had saved
him from the crocodile the second of his
faiths who was already defeated I don't
believe in all this but I do believe in
love and I want to spend the rest of my
life with you whatever obstacles we face
in the future we will fight it together
and I will always be there to protect
you and I love you too and so they got
married and the kingdoms celebrated and
rejoiced she is so beautiful oh they
make such a cute couple long live the
brains and brains eyes together Elena
and in arose dedicated their life for
the welfare of the public
the people of the kingdom loved them so
much that they were crowned as the new
king and queen
long live the new king one night when
interrupts and Elena were sleeping she
noticed something creeping in the
shadows
slowly slithering towards her husband as
it got closer she noticed that it was a
serpent aha
I have been waiting for this day to come
Elena laid out a bowl of milk before the
serpent it sprang towards the milk and
drank it in haste after finishing the
last drop it fell asleep the clever and
witty Elena
anticipated an encounter with the snake
and had had a bowl of milk mixed with
magical herbs kept by her side that
would put it to sleep then she ordered
the guards to take the snake and throw
it in a swamp miles away thus she had
defeated the third and final fate of
inner us and protected him all the while
with her intelligence and forward
thinking Elena and interest set out on
expeditions to explore the world
together and lived happily ever after
together they overcame their obstacles
and fear and were now braver than ever
you
